text: Thierry Pomel (born 4 October 1957) is a French equestrian. He competed in two events at the 2000 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1957 births Category:Living people Category:French male equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of France Category:Equestrians at the 2000 Summer Olympics Category:People from Saumur
title: Thierry Pomel
